sentences.sContent: How then would this dinosaur have moved?
sentences.sContent_eng: How then would this dinosaur have moved?
sentences.sCn: 那么这种恐龙要如何移动呢？

sentences.sContent: From there you can look straight down to the dinosaur fossils displayed on the floor below.
sentences.sContent_eng: From there you can look straight down to the dinosaur fossils displayed on the floor below.
sentences.sCn: 从那儿往向下看，你可以看到陈列在地面上的恐龙化石。

sentences.sContent: Like shark and dinosaur teeth they would break, but then regenerate.
sentences.sContent_eng: Like shark and dinosaur teeth they would break, but then regenerate.
sentences.sCn: 它们就像鲨鱼和恐龙的牙齿一样会断裂，但也会再生。

trans.tranOther: one of a group of  reptile s  that lived millions of years ago
